title: The B-52's Discography (320 Kbps MP3) {solstars}
description:
This torrent includes every studio album the B-52's have ever recorded.  I did not include compilations, with the exception of "Party Mix".  I included this one because it contains totally different versions of several tracks.  In some cases, I even prefer the version on "Party Mix" over the original (like "Give me Back my Man").

Most of these CDs are the remasters, but some are original releases I purchased back in the 1980's.  They are all in individual folders so that you can pick and choose what you want.

If there is interest, I may release a FLAC version of this torrent.

There is a lot of work in this torrent.  Please leave comments on quality, and above all - please SEED!

All of my rips come from the original CD and have embedded cover art.  Enjoy!


-----------------------
